memberdef.name: NRF_INTERNAL_EGU_CHAN_NUM_EXTRACT
memberdef.initializer: if (0) {} \ NRFX_FOREACH_PRESENT(EGU, NRF_INTERNAL_ELSE_IF_EXTRACT_1, (), (), chan_num, _CH_NUM, p_reg) \ else \ { \ chan_num = 0; \ }

briefdescription.para: Macro getting pointer to the structure of registers of the EGU peripheral.

parameterdescription.para: EGU instance index.

simplesect.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the EGU peripheral.

detaileddescription.para: Trigger 0 for triggering the corresponding TRIGGERED[0] event.
Trigger 1 for triggering the corresponding TRIGGERED[1] event.

briefdescription.para: EGU tasks.

briefdescription.para: EGU events.

briefdescription.para: EGU interrupts.
Function for getting the maximum channel number of the given EGU.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

briefdescription.para: Function for triggering the specified EGU task.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
EGU task.

briefdescription.para: Function for returning the address of the specified EGU task register.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
EGU task.

simplesect.para: Address of the specified EGU task register.

briefdescription.para: Function for returning the specified EGU TRIGGER task.

parameterdescription.para: Channel number.

briefdescription.para: Function for retrieving the state of the EGU event.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
EGU event to be checked.
The event has been generated.
The event has not been generated.

briefdescription.para: Function for clearing the specified EGU event.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
EGU event to clear.

briefdescription.para: Function for returning the address of the specified EGU event register.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
EGU event.

simplesect.para: Address of the specified EGU event register.

briefdescription.para: Function for returning the specified EGU TRIGGERED event.

parameterdescription.para: Channel number.

briefdescription.para: Function for enabling one or more of the EGU interrupts.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Mask of interrupts to be enabled. Use nrf_egu_int_mask_t values for bit masking.

briefdescription.para: Function for retrieving the state of one or more of the EGU interrupts.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Mask of interrupts to be checked. Use nrf_egu_int_mask_t values for bit masking.

briefdescription.para: Function for disabling one or more of the EGU interrupts.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Mask of interrupts to be disabled. Use nrf_egu_int_mask_t values for bit masking.

briefdescription.para: Function for retrieving the state of interrupt of the specified EGU channel.

parameterdescription.para: Channel number.

briefdescription.para: Function for setting the subscribe configuration for a given EGU task.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Task for which to set the configuration.
Channel through which to subscribe events.

briefdescription.para: Function for clearing the subscribe configuration for a given EGU task.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Task for which to clear the configuration.

briefdescription.para: Function for setting the publish configuration for a given EGU event.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Event for which to set the configuration.
Channel through which to publish the event.

briefdescription.para: Function for clearing the publish configuration for a given EGU event.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Event for which to clear the configuration.
